title: Diamond Floral Motif Haaram Set with Ruby & Emerald Accents
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds. Adorned with a central pear-shaped Emerald gemstone and a round Ruby gemstone. Finished with lustrous South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisitely crafted Haaram features a delicate floral motif throughout, enhanced by intricate diamond detailing. The central pendant boasts a striking pear-shaped Emerald, complemented by a round Ruby. The matching earrings mirror the necklace's design, completing the ensemble. The necklace is finished with a unique rope chain. The pearl drops add a touch of classic elegance.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with vibrant accents of green (emerald) and red (ruby). The pearls offer a soft
occasions: and special celebrations. A stunning choice for brides or anyone seeking a touch of timeless elegance for a contemporary event.
description: This haaram set is a harmonious blend of tradition and modern aesthetics. The intricate diamond work, combined with the vibrant gemstones and lustrous pearls, makes it a truly captivating piece. Its enduring design and exceptional craftsmanship guarantee it will be cherished for generations, making it an excellent investment.
